        masterRenderer - Wraps all required renderers

              Loader loader,

       throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        masterRenderer - Wraps all required renderers
        loader - Loads the required objects to the GPU
        glslVersion - Version of GLSL to use in shader programs

        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if shader programs do not compile properly
